CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): Moved from A.2.3.3 (AE Reporter)
E2B (R3): C.5.4 Study Type Conformance: Optional, but required if C.1.3=2 (Report from study). Data Type: 1N OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.8 Value Allowed: 1=Clinical trials 2=Individual patient use(e.g. ‘compassionate use’ or ‘named patient basis’) 3=Other studies (e.g. pharmacoepidemiology, pharmacoeconomics, intensive monitoring)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This information should be provided if the ‘Type of Report' has been populated with ‘Report from study’.
CustomField.label: Study Type
